summary: Fixed RouteNotFoundException for 'login' route by creating AuthenticateSessionForFilament middleware that extends Laravel's AuthenticateSession but redirects to Filament login route instead of default 'login' route. Updated AdminPanelProvider to use the new middleware. This resolves the 403 error when accessing GeneralSettings page.
current_status: AuthenticateSessionForFilament middleware created and configured. It redirects to Filament admin login route (filament.admin.auth.login) instead of non-existent 'login' route. AdminPanelProvider updated to use the new middleware. GeneralSettings page should now be accessible without RouteNotFoundException.
